events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on highway 50 resulting in visible damage to the front bumper and engine compartment.
The claim has been categorized as an Auto Accident claim based on the report of car damage and accident specifics provided.
An insurance agent was assigned promptly to handle the case and assist the customer throughout the claim process.
Acknowledgment of the submitted auto accident claim was sent to the customer confirming receipt and next steps.
The customer was asked to provide photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including accident photos, police report, and two independent repair quotes.
The investigation team initiated review of the submitted evidence to validate the claim and assess liability and damages.
Investigation concluded with findings supporting the claim and confirming the extent of damages consistent with reported accident.
A settlement offer was presented to the customer that covers repair costs and rental car reimbursement as documented in claim.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the quick handling of the vehicle accident claim.
Following customer acceptance, the claim was formally approved to proceed with reimbursement and repair arrangements.
The payment covering all approved repairs and related costs was successfully issued to the customer's designated account.
The auto accident claim has been officially closed following payment clearance and confirmation of vehicle repair completion.
All files and documentation related to this auto accident claim were archived in the system for future reference and compliance.
